channel.title: Nurikabe on Bounded-Error Log
channel.description: Recent content in Nurikabe on Bounded-Error Log

item.title: Puzzle 10 / Nurikabe 3
item.description: A ratio-preserving enlargement of the janko.at sample invocation puzzle, perhaps. I wanted to try using smaller clues. Finally a grid too large for full-size displaying! Is that even supposed to be an achievement?
